food.name: Cheeseburger Roll
food.desp: These clever, crunchy spring rolls are filled with a mixture of beef, mustard, mozzarella and onion, which means you get the convenience of a finger food and the flavours of a cheeseburger.

food.name: Mexican-style Roll
food.desp: A Mexican/American twist on the Aussie classic, which was in turn inspired by Asian spring rolls! This recipe has slow-cooked beef barbacoa filling inside a corn or flour tortilla casing.

food.name: Egg Roll
food.desp: Egg Rolls and the PERFECT crispy appetizers, made with chicken, cabbage, mushrooms, and seasoning wrapped in egg roll wrappers.

food.name: Vegan Spring Rolls
food.desp: The golden rolls with pork meatballs, rice noodles, fresh herbs and a sweet and spicy sauce, slow-cooked and fried.Best Experience!!

food.name: Pepperoni Pizza Rolls
food.desp: Crispy, crunchy, chewy, melty pepperoni rolls including Buffalo Chicken Dip, Cheesy Beef Rotel Dip and Ultimate Bean Dip.

food.name: Fried Honey Rolls
food.desp: Traditionally made for celebrations and special occasions, these deep-fried pastries drizzled with honey are also known as diples.

food.name: Paneer Kathi Roll
food.desp: Popular Indian street-food, Paneer Kathi rolls are warm, layered parathas filled with spicy paneer, mixed peppers and sweet caramelized onions.

food.name: Sausage Rolls
food.desp: meat pies, pasties, or Sausage Rolls, all over the world you can find versions of the simple, yet delicious combination of ground meat and buttery pastry.

food.name: Butter Chicken
food.desp: An all time favorite-bonless Chicken roll , soaked in spiced yoghurt, cooked in a rich tomato butter gravy topped with crunchy crackers.

food.name: Chinese Egg Roll
food.desp: Egg rolls are hard to resist , especially when each bite has the perfect balance of crunchy texture and savory filling. These vegetarian finger foods are filled with mushrooms,carrots etc.

food.name: Aloo Roll
food.desp: Aloo Kathi Roll is a very popular street food in India. It is made by wrapping potato cutlets in Indian Bread with Green Chutney and delicious wraps or rolls stuffed with a spiced mix veg stuffing

food.name: Cheese Bacon Roll
food.desp: A bacon roll is a simple way of serving bacon in the form of a sandwich, using a soft or crusty bread roll. Most often served with brown sauce or tomato ketchup.

food.name: Bread Roll
food.desp: A bread roll is a small, usually round loaf of bread for one person. Bread rolls are commonly served as a meal accompaniment, used to make sandwiches similar to those produced using slices of bread.

food.name: Hotdog Bread Roll
food.desp: Cheese Dog Bread Rolls are as fun to make as they are to eat and are the best use for day-old sliced bread. Golden, crunchy, and stuffed with meaty hot dogs and melty cheese, they’re a hearty snack.

food.name: Classic Mutton Roll
food.desp: Mutton Frankie is the classic one and is being served from ages. Frankie is an Indian bread rolled with mutton tossed in hot spices and flavored onions.Try out this old classic recipe to refresh your mood.

food.name: Paneer Chilli Roll
food.desp: Popular Indian street-food, Paneer Kathi rolls are warm, layered parathas filled with spicy paneer, mixed peppers and sweet caramelized onions. Whether you make it for a quick weeknight meal or a leisurely gathering, these kathi rolls are sure to be a hit!

food.name: Veg Shama Roll
food.desp: When it comes to starters, Chicken Shami Kebab is one of the best non-vegetarian snacks to be served.Shami kebabs are succulent minced chicken with chana dal with spicy masala filling inside and crispy fried on the outside.
